tool.name: TrimN
tool.command: remove_fake_cut_sites_DNAnexus.py '$fasta_in' step1_out.fasta step1.log && trim_Ns_DNAnexus.py '$fasta_in' step2_out.list && clip_regions_DNAnexus.py step1_out.fasta step2_out.list final_out.fasta

param.name: fasta_in
param.label: Fasta file input
param.help: Fasta file to trim, and from which to remove Ns and fake cut sites.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
TrimNs is part of the VGP pipeline, and is made of a series of python scripts which trim off large stretches of N bases and to remove fake cut sites that sometimes get inserted at the end of bionano hybrid scaffolds.
